name: Head Last Post Section Widget
author: lion2486

sections.description: With this Widget-Plugin you can add a widget to your wordpress and select a post or page. Then you insert a regular expression as provided to preg_split php function in order to split your page to “sections”. Then you select how many “sections” the widget will display.
sections.installation:
1. Install from WordPress REPO.
  2. Go to Widgets and add a widget!
sections.changelog:
1.01

  • Readme Updates
  • some code fixes
  • Long description added

1.0

  • Initial Plugin Import

short_description: Select a post or page and display the first "section"(as you put the delimiters) in a widget.
description: With this Widget-Plugin you can add a widget to your wordpress and select a post or page. Then you insert a regular expression as provided to preg_split php function in order to split your page to “sections”. Then you select how many “sections” the widget will display.
